column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Next up - the Grand Tower. The price has actually increased since I first dined there
column2: so I'm not sure if they added some additional items
column3: but I ordered it with 3 friends the first time and we were presented w/2oz of salmon ceviche
column4: about a dozen very large shrimp
column5: and 2 dozen oysters (split between east coast and west coast varieties). The entire tower
column7: is indeed grand. And it was quite a bit of food; it's really enough to share with a group of 6 as a starter. Super fresh
